detail_desc: Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch. Pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long skirt in a crinkled weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered tiers for added width. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a small stand-up collar and long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs. Tapered waist and a flared peplum.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline, opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Scarf in fine-knit merino wool. Size 110x15 cm.

Slim-fit jeans in soft, washed denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and fake front and back pockets. Legs with flap pockets and straight hems. Detachable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed finish.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard knit with a brushed finish in a relaxed fit. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a wide, elasticated hem. Medium support.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a text appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Push-up triangle bikini top with frills at the front and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Scarf in a wool weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 32x180 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lace-trimmed flounce at the top.
Knee-length shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Sun visor in tape-trimmed braided paper straw with an elastic strap at the back.
Trousers in a checked weave with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and ties at the back of the neck and pleats at the top. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in cotton jersey with a decorative seam at the top.
Shorter shorts in woven fabric with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and slightly wider legs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless blouse in softly draping satin with a V-shaped opening at the front and ties at the neckline. Gathered seam at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed style with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Chelsea boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides, and a loop at the top, front and back. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip in the side. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves with ribbing and a flounce at the cuffs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a gently rounded hem.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with a glossy print. Lined in a cotton weave. Width of brim 5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a wrapover, draped top, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim, straight legs.
Baby Exclusive. Dressing gown in soft organic cotton with a hood and a wrapover with a button at the sides.
Treggings in patterned stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short metal necklace with different-shaped pendants in plastic and metal. Adjustable length 38.5-46.5 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
V-neck top in cotton jersey.
Treggings with a high waist and concealed elastication.
Knee-length, flared skirt in soft imitation suede with a press-stud and concealed zip at the back and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.

Cropped jacket in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and tabs with buttons at the hem.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Imitation leather card holder with a zipped compartment and four card slots on the back. Size 7x12.5 cm.
Short top in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.

V-neck blouse in soft patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered yoke at the back,gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist. The blouse is made from recycled polyester.

Sleeveless shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and side pockets. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a frill and narrow shoulder straps, one with a sewn-on metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms.

Shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Clutch bag in paper straw with a flap and metal fastener, a detachable metal chain shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 4 cm. Height 15 cm. Width 25 cm.
Fully lined joggers in woven fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Fake fly, side pockets, back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Jersey lining.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and straight legs.

Printed cargo jacket in washed cotton twill with appliqués and decorative shoulder tabs. Collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and flap chest and front pockets with a button. Lined.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with an extra high waist, button fly and straight legs.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Classic jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings, all-in-one pyjamas, a T-shirt and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with a wide foldover waistband, elasticated heels and full feet. Pyjamas with an all-over print, press-studs down the front and at the crotch, elasticated heels and full feet. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders. Hat with an appliqué on the front.
Cold shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, shoulders, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Loose-fitting trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Moisturising lip balm in a mermaid-tail-shaped container with a shimmering finish. Pineapple flavour.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined, 5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Velour all-in-one pyjamas with an appliqué on the front, and press-studs down one side and one leg.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved blouse in satin with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a round neckline that has an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
